channel.title: HELP! Syipker taking over my server!
channel.description: Some guy logged in cursed out my staff and threatend to take my server down... after a fight a player SYIPKER kept logging in... WTF do i do?!?! It wont let me kick him, ban him or ip him??!?!?!?!

item.title: HELP! Syipker taking over my server!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

danbruler:

Well i have had this before and the best way is to manual input him in the ip ban file but you have to go to the characters folder and fined one of the accounts and find the ip in that accounts file and put it in the ip ban file… if this doesnt work let me know cuz it worked when it happened to me but it might depend on source but idk

That is a bad way to keep SYIpkpker’s off your server.

There are many ways to defeat the dreaded SYI, you can use an Array list to make sure that 1 ip is used per log in, or you could use Grahams Thread Per Client (Recommended), Another way could be Blakes socket filter, or you could write Mini 2.0 or another API into your server.

Read full topic
item.source: HELP! Syipker taking over my server!
